amendment.description: Amendment strikes the provision that permits financing entities to use funds repaid by participants to provide assistance to additional participants.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 111-475 to make sundry amendments to the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Markey (MA) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Markey (MA).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Markey (MA) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
